overview: Karger is behind all the cattle rustling. After Tom Devlin catches his man Burke in the act, Burke hides evidence against Karger in his jail cell. Later when Tom is jailed he accidentally finds the evidence, but the Karger encited mob has jailed the Sheriff and is already on the loose.
tagline: RECKLESS ROMANCE ON A DANGER-PAVED TRAIL!
title: Forbidden Trail
